summary: Portfolio app where backend enriches all holdings with price data (with reliable/efficient external price lookup).
architectural_notes: Implement price lookup/enrichment loop + aggregation on the backend so each holding returned includes price data.
known_issues: Price data is currently only returned for one holding even though multiple holdings are returned.

new_feature_requests.summary: Backend should enrich every portfolio holding with price data (not just a single holding).
Update the backend so portfolio retrieval returns price data for every holding in every returned portfolio (not just a single holding), by enriching holdings on the backend before returning them.
Apply the same backend holding price enrichment behavior to public portfolio reads so getPublicPortfolio returns holdings with price data for every holding.
Ensure backend enrichment is efficient and reliable when fetching prices for multiple holdings, and that partial failures do not prevent other holdings from being enriched and returned.
